00002 #include "ext.h"

00006 void *filein_class;
00007 
00008 typedef struct filein {
00009     t_object f_ob;
00010     t_filehandle f_fh;          
00011     short f_open;               /* spool flag */
00012     short f_spool;
00013     Byte **f_data;          /* read in data */
00014     long f_size;
00015     void *f_out;
00016     void *f_eof;
00017     void *f_readdone;
00018 } t_filein;
00019 
00020 t_symbol *ps_nothing,*ps_spool,*ps_int,*ps_in1,*ps_in2;
00021 
00022 void filein_access(t_filein *x, t_symbol *s, short ac, t_atom *av);
00023 void filein_int(t_filein *x, long n);
00024 void filein_in1(t_filein *x, long n);
00025 void filein_in2(t_filein *x, long n);
00026 void filein_close(t_filein *x);
00027 void filein_open(t_filein *x, char *name);
00028 void filein_doread(t_filein *x, t_symbol *s);
00029 void filein_spool(t_filein *x, t_symbol *s);
00030 void filein_read(t_filein *x, t_symbol *s);
00031 void filein_free(t_filein *x);
00032 void filein_assist(t_filein *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s);
00033 void *filein_new(t_symbol *fn, t_symbol *spoolFlag);
00034 void ctopcpy(unsigned char *p1, char *p2);

00036 
00037 int main()
00038 {
00039     setup((t_messlist **)&filein_class, (method)filein_new, (method)filein_free, (short)sizeof(t_filein),
00040         0L, A_DEFSYM, A_DEFSYM, 0);
00041     addint((method)filein_int);
00042     addinx((method)filein_in1,1);
00043     addinx((method)filein_in2,2);
00044     addmess((method)filein_close,   "fclose",   0);
00045     addmess((method)filein_spool,   "spool",    A_DEFSYM,0);
00046     addmess((method)filein_read,    "read",     A_DEFSYM,0);
00047     addmess((method)filein_assist,  "assist",   A_CANT,0);
00048     finder_addclass("System","filein");
00049     ps_nothing = gensym("");
00050     ps_spool = gensym("spool");
00051     ps_int = gensym("int");
00052     ps_in1 = gensym("in1");
00053     ps_in2 = gensym("in2");
00054     
00055     return (0);
00056 }
00057 
00058 void filein_access(t_filein *x, t_symbol *s, short ac, t_atom *av)
00059 {
00060     OSErr err;
00061     Byte data[8];
00062     long count;
00063     unsigned long dummy;
00064     
00065     if (s==ps_int)
00066         count = 1;
00067     else if (s==ps_in1)
00068         count = 2;
00069     else
00070         count = 4;
00071     err = sysfile_setpos(x->f_fh,SYSFILE_FROMSTART,av->a_w.w_long);
00072     if (err)
00073         object_error((t_object *)x, "seek err %d",err);
00074     else {
00075         err = sysfile_read(x->f_fh,&count,data);
00076         if (err)
00077             object_error((t_object *)x, "read err %d",err);
00078         else {
00079             if (count==1)
00080                 dummy = data[0];
00081             else
00082                 sysmem_copyptr(data,&dummy,count);
00083             outlet_int(x->f_out,dummy);
00084         }
00085     }
00086 }
00087 
00088 void filein_int(t_filein *x, long n)        /* byte access */
00089 {
00090     t_atom info;
00091     Byte data[16];
00092     long count;
00093     OSErr err;
00094     
00095     if (x->f_open) {
00096         if (isr()) {
00097             SETLONG(&info,n);
00098             defer(x,(method)filein_access,ps_int,1,&info);
00099         } else {
00100             err = sysfile_setpos(x->f_fh,SYSFILE_FROMSTART,n);
00101             if (err)
00102                 object_error((t_object *)x, "seek err %d",err);
00103             else {
00104                 count = 1;
00105                 err = sysfile_read(x->f_fh,&count,data);
00106                 if (err)
00107                     object_error((t_object *)x, "read err %d",err);
00108                 else {
00109                     count = data[0];
00110                     outlet_int(x->f_out,count);
00111                 }
00112             }
00113         }
00114     } else if (x->f_data) {
00115         if (n < 0)
00116             object_error((t_object *)x, "access out of range");
00117         else if (n >= x->f_size)
00118             outlet_bang(x->f_eof);
00119         else {
00120             count = *((*(x->f_data))+n);
00121             outlet_int(x->f_out,count);
00122         }
00123     }
00124 }
00125 
00126 void filein_in1(t_filein *x, long n)        /* int access */
00127 {
00128     t_atom info;
00129     unsigned short data[4];
00130     long count;
00131     OSErr err;
00132     
00133     if (x->f_open) {
00134         if (isr()) {
00135             SETLONG(&info,n);
00136             defer(x,(method)filein_access,ps_in1,1,&info);
00137         } else {
00138             err = sysfile_setpos(x->f_fh,SYSFILE_FROMSTART,n);
00139             if (err)
00140                 object_error((t_object *)x, "seek err %d",err);
00141             else {
00142                 count = 2;
00143                 err = sysfile_read(x->f_fh,&count,data);
00144                 if (err)
00145                     object_error((t_object *)x, "read err %d",err);
00146                 else {
00147                     count = data[0];
00148                     outlet_int(x->f_out,count);
00149                 }
00150             }
00151         }
00152     } else if (x->f_data) {
00153         if (n < 0)
00154             object_error((t_object *)x, "access out of range");
00155         else if (n >= x->f_size)
00156             outlet_bang(x->f_eof);
00157         else {
00158             sysmem_copyptr(*(x->f_data)+n,data,2L);
00159             outlet_int(x->f_out,(unsigned long)data[0]);
00160          }
00161     }
00162 }
00163 
00164 void filein_in2(t_filein *x, long n)        /* long access */
00165 {
00166     t_atom info;
00167     unsigned long data[4];
00168     long count;
00169     OSErr err;
00170     
00171     if (x->f_open) {
00172         if (isr()) {
00173             SETLONG(&info,n);
00174             defer(x,(method)filein_access,ps_in2,1,&info);
00175         } else {
00176             err = sysfile_setpos(x->f_fh,SYSFILE_FROMSTART,n);
00177             if (err)
00178                 object_error((t_object *)x, "seek err %d",err);
00179             else {
00180                 count = 4;
00181                 err = sysfile_read(x->f_fh,&count,data);
00182                 if (err)
00183                     object_error((t_object *)x, "read err %d",err);
00184                 else {
00185                     count = data[0];
00186                     outlet_int(x->f_out,count);
00187                 }
00188             }
00189         }
00190     } else if (x->f_data) {
00191         if (n < 0)
00192             object_error((t_object *)x, "access out of range");
00193         else if (n >= x->f_size)
00194             outlet_bang(x->f_eof);
00195         else {
00196             sysmem_copyptr(*(x->f_data)+n,data,4L);
00197             outlet_int(x->f_out,data[0]);
00198         }
00199     }
00200 }
00201 
00202 void filein_close(t_filein *x)
00203 {
00204     if (x->f_open) {
00205         sysfile_close(x->f_fh);
00206         x->f_fh = 0;
00207         x->f_open = FALSE;
00208     }
00209     if (x->f_data) {
00210         sysmem_lockhandle((t_handle)x->f_data,0);
00211         sysmem_freehandle((t_handle)x->f_data);
00212         x->f_data = 0;
00213     }
00214 }
00215 
00216 void filein_open(t_filein *x, char *name)
00217 {
00218     long size;
00219     
00220     if (x->f_spool)
00221         x->f_open = TRUE;
00222     else {
00223         sysfile_geteof(x->f_fh,&size);
00224         if (!(x->f_data = (Byte **)sysmem_newhandle(size)))
00225             object_error((t_object *)x, "%s too big to read",name);
00226         else {
00227             sysmem_lockhandle((t_handle)x->f_data,1);
00228             sysfile_read(x->f_fh,&size,*x->f_data);
00229             x->f_size = size;
00230         }
00231         sysfile_close(x->f_fh);
00232     }
00233     x->f_spool = FALSE;
00234 }
00235 
00236 void filein_doread(t_filein *x, t_symbol *s)
00237 {
00238     short vol,err;
00239     char ps[MAX_PATH_CHARS];
00240     long type;
00241     short savelock;
00242     
00243     filein_close(x);
00244     if (s==ps_nothing) {
00245         if (open_dialog(ps,&vol,&type,0L,0))
00246             return;
00247     } else {
00248         strcpy(ps,s->s_name);
00249         if (locatefile_extended(ps,&vol,&type,&type,-1)) {
00250             object_error((t_object *)x, "%s: can't find file",ps);
00251             return;
00252         }
00253     }
00254     err = path_opensysfile(ps,vol,&x->f_fh,READ_PERM);
00255     if (err) {
00256         object_error((t_object *)x, "%s: error %d opening file",ps,err);
00257         return;
00258     }
00259     filein_open(x,ps);
00260     savelock = lockout_set(1);
00261     outlet_bang(x->f_readdone);
00262     lockout_set(savelock);
00263 }
00264 
00265 void filein_spool(t_filein *x, t_symbol *s)
00266 {
00267     x->f_spool = TRUE;
00268     defer(x,(method)filein_doread,s,0,0L);
00269 }
00270 
00271 void filein_read(t_filein *x, t_symbol *s)
00272 {
00273     x->f_spool = FALSE;
00274     defer(x,(method)filein_doread,s,0,0L);
00275 }
00276 
00277 void filein_free(t_filein *x)
00278 {
00279     filein_close(x);
00280 }
00281 
00282 void filein_assist(t_filein *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s)
00283 {
00284     // this system eliminates the need for a STR# resource
00285     if (m==1) {
00286         switch (a) {
00287             case 0: sprintf(s,"Read Byte from File"); break;
00288             case 1: sprintf(s,"Read Word from File"); break;
00289             case 2: sprintf(s,"Read Long from File"); break;
00290         }
00291     } 
00292     else if (m==2) {
00293         switch (a) {
00294             case 0: sprintf(s,"File Data Output"); break;
00295             case 1: sprintf(s,"bang On End of File"); break;
00296             case 2: sprintf(s,"bang When Read/Spool Finished"); break;
00297         }
00298     }
00299 }
00300 
00301 
00302 void *filein_new(t_symbol *fn, t_symbol *spoolFlag)
00303 {
00304     t_filein *x;
00305     
00306     x = (t_filein *)newobject(filein_class);
00307     x->f_readdone = bangout(x);
00308     x->f_eof = bangout(x);
00309     x->f_out = intout(x);
00310     intin(x,2);
00311     intin(x,1);
00312     x->f_open = FALSE;
00313     x->f_fh = 0;
00314     x->f_spool = 0;
00315     x->f_data = 0;
00316     if (fn != ps_nothing) {
00317         if (spoolFlag==ps_spool)
00318             x->f_spool = TRUE;
00319         else
00320             x->f_spool = FALSE;
00321         filein_doread(x,fn);
00322     }
00323     return (x);
00324 }

00326 #ifndef WIN_VERSION
00327 #ifndef TARGET_RT_MAC_MACHO
00328 char *strcpy(char *s1, const char *s2)
00329 {
00330     char *ret = s1;
00331     
00332     while ((*s1++ = *s2++) != 0)
00333         ;
00334 
00335     return ret;
00336 }
00337 #endif// TARGET_RT_MAC_MACHO
00338 #endif// WIN_VERSION
